word:
219
     Turning to Thomas He said, \93Reach hither thy finger, and behold My hands; and reach hither thy hand, and thrust it into My side: and be not faithless, but believing.\94 . . . [Thomas] had no desire for further proof. His heart leaped for joy, and he cast himself at the feet of Jesus crying, \93My Lord and my God.\94\97DA 807.
